competitors.name: BigCommerce
competitors.notes: Direct SaaS competitor, similar features, 99.99% uptime, built-in SSL, strong SEO tools

competitors.name: WooCommerce
competitors.notes: Free WordPress plugin, largest market share, self-hosted solution

competitors.name: Magento (Adobe Commerce)
competitors.notes: Open-source platform with full customization control, strong developer community

competitors.name: Wix
competitors.notes: Website builder with e-commerce, good for small businesses, less scalable

competitors.name: Squarespace
competitors.notes: Visual site builder with e-commerce capabilities, limited scalability vs Shopify

competitors.name: Volusion
competitors.notes: Similar pricing structure and interface to Shopify

competitors.name: PrestaShop
competitors.notes: French open-source platform, launched cloud version in 2015

competitors.name: Weebly
competitors.notes: Easy-to-use website builder with e-commerce features

context: Shopify IPO year. Company positioning itself as the e-commerce platform for entrepreneurs, competing against both established open-source solutions (WooCommerce, Magento) and website builders expanding into e-commerce (Wix, Squarespace, Weebly).
